frontmatter.title: Achieving Clarity: Effective Methods for Data Correlation Smoothing
frontmatter.summary: To smooth out data correlations and reduce the effect of spikes in temperature and humidity readings, I used techniques like the moving average (or rolling average). By averaging each data point with its neighboring values, I created more stable and reliable data for better analysis.
